Text:
function RYU_EP04_14()
    -- .承-5【12月第1週】「がんばれ女の子」
    SaveData.Title = "がんばれ女の子"

    -- //BG：1-A教室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ Three weeks left until Uran Ryuguuin and Daria Himegami’s Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ Our Erika faction and the boys’ division also declared support for Uran. In contrast, Hermes Himegami expressed support for Daria. ]])

    MSG([[ The school was divided between our conservative faction and the coed faction led by the Himegami sisters. ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン・通常、ヒユ・笑顔、リラ・通常
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0442.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “We’ve got an update on the Princess Election!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0443.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Right now, Daria has 54% support, while Uran-sama has 46%!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1359.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Oh! That’s going up again, huh!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1833.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “We did it, Uran-san! You're almost catching up with Daria!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0674.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Yes, thank you all so much!” ]])

    MSG([[ The classroom was buzzing with excitement. After all, the other side was the largest faction in the school. ]])

    MSG([[ For us to be about to match their support rate was truly a great achievement. It was impossible not to be happy. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1360.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “I gotta say, those posters from the boys’ division have a huge effect.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1834.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “You mean the posters of Uran-san hanging at the entrance? Those were painstakingly made by Mask Senpai #2.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0444.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “I thought so during the Hakuyou Festival too, but the boys’ division really excels in arts. Quite the unexpected talent.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0675.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Well, they are heirs to the ‘Houou’ group. Their usual behavior might be questionable, but their talent is undeniable.” ]])

    MSG([[ The boys’ division had faithfully assisted Uran’s PR efforts as promised. ]])

    MSG([[ From handling flyers to creating election posters and videos. ]])

    MSG([[ Since this was a ‘Conservative vs Coed’ setup, they refrained from overt support, but their contribution was more than enough. ]])

    MSG([[ The fact that Daria’s faction hadn’t done prominent PR also helped shift momentum clearly towards Uran. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1361.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Let’s keep growing into the school’s biggest faction at this rate! Yay!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0021")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu・Knights】
 “Yay!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：4F廊下（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013bd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ After the usual meeting ended, with no time left, I was thinking of changing out of my cross-dress in the multi-use restroom when Uran followed after me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1835.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “What’s the matter?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0676.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Uh, Erika-san… I have a favor to ask.” ]])

    MSG([[ Uran fidgeted with her fingers and whispered hesitantly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0677.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I want to visit the boys’ division to thank them as well... Could you accompany me?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
STOP_BGM(2000)

    -- 　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：男子部教室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Then came the boys’ division’s homeroom before class. ]])

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、ウラン（赤面）、先輩たち（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ha")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-500,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    MSG([[ Uran stood with me, still cross-dressed, at the podium and bowed deeply to everyone. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0678.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Um, boys’ division… I truly apologize for any trouble I caused before.” ]])

    MSG([[ Instead of thanking them for the election, she unexpectedly apologized. ]])

    MSG([[ Surprised by the unexpected turn, the boys were left puzzled. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1836.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Uran-san, I’m sure the boys don’t care about the Hakuyou Festival anymore.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0679.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “R-Really?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0680.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “But I treated them terribly before.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0681.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I felt it was only polite to apologize before discussing anything else.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0376.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “Just being able to think that way shows growth, right?” ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga smiled and continued. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0377.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “Erika’s right, no one here wants an apology. What matters is what happens after Ryuguuin wins the next Princess Election.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-500,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0113.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 “Heh... Ouga’s right.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0114.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 “If we support you... will coeducation be abolished and we get kicked out of school?” ]])

    MSG([[ Mask Senpai #3 directed hostile intent at Uran even through his mask. ]])

    MSG([[ Facing this hostility head-on, Uran responded with a dignified attitude. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0682.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “No, of course not, please rest assured.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0683.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I sincerely thank you for supporting me. Should I defeat Daria, I plan to bring change to the boys’ division.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1837.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Change?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was hearing this for the first time as well. What kind of idea could Uran have? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0684.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Yes. That change would be to create opportunities to interact with the girls’ division. Through these exchanges, I want to gather opinions on whether to increase the boys’ division’s numbers.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0685.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “We haven’t had enough contact with the boys’ division to make such decisions. Experiencing things firsthand and exchanging opinions properly.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0686.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “And thus, to grow Yuriai Private Academy and ourselves in a better direction.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0687.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “It’s important not only to preserve tradition but also to create new culture.” ]])

    MSG([[
    【Senpais】
 “…………” ]])
    -- //ボイスなし

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0378.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “…………” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1838.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “…………” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Everyone was stunned into silence by Uran’s unexpected words. ]])

    MSG([[ Words that would never have come from Uran before. ]])

    MSG([[ She balanced preserving tradition with accepting change. To me, it was a very compelling proposal. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0379.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “There are many issues, but as a draft, it’s sufficient.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-500,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0110.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 “I think it’s a wonderful idea!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0082.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 “I agree! I support Uran-dono!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-500,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0115.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 “Damn... I was gonna find fault with it...” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0688.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Thank you all for listening. I look forward to your continued support.” ]])

    MSG([[ Tears welled up in Uran’s eyes. That the boys’ division and Uran, who had been rivals before, could reconcile so completely. ]])

    MSG([[ It was so moving that even I felt like crying. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0380.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “Erika, no need for you to cry too, right?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1839.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Ah…” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Well, I was actually crying. But it’s understandable to be overwhelmed like that. ]])

    MSG([[ Because today’s events might hold really big significance for Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    MSG([[ Thus, Uran formally reconciled with the boys’ division and advanced further promotion of the Princess Election. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0689.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Oh? By the way, where’s Minato-san today?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1840.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Ah!? T-That’s! He said he’s going to be late due to a stomachache!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0690.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Oh dear, that’s unfortunate. I’ll properly go thank him another time.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1841.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Ah, haha…” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
STOP_BGM(1000)
    -- 　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_15")
end
